text_elements.typography_notes: The brush script style gives a traditional and artistic feel, but may affect readability for non-native speakers.

color_palette.contrast_notes: Good contrast between black text and white background, red accent adds emphasis.

layout.balance_notes: Centered layout with balanced text and symbol placement.
layout.spacing_notes: Adequate white space around elements enhances readability.

issues.description: Brush script may be hard to read for non-native speakers.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Consider a more legible font for broader audience appeal.

trend_alignment.notes: Aligns with trends emphasizing cultural authenticity and traditional aesthetics.
